title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Scaling GenAI on AWS Without Breaking the Bank through FinOps (AIM227)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 通过FinOps在AWS上扩展生成式AI而不超预算 (AIM227)
abstract: Generative AI is transforming industries—and AWS managed services are accelerating that shift—but these workloads can also be some of the most expensive and unpredictable to run. In this session, we’ll break down GenAI into four deployment modes and dive into key AWS services like Amazon Bedrock, SageMaker, and GPU-powered EC2 families, explaining how customers are charged and where the biggest savings lie. Drawing on real-world customer lessons, you’ll learn how to apply FinOps principles to boost GPU utilization, forecast spend, implement chargeback models, and track unit cost metrics—ensuring AWS GenAI workloads remain scalable and financially sustainable This presentation is brought to you by IBM Cloudability, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 生成式AI正在改变各个行业——AWS托管服务正在加速这一转变——但这些工作负载也可能是运行成本最高且最不可预测的。在本次会议中，我们将把生成式AI分解为四种部署模式，深入探讨Amazon Bedrock、SageMaker和GPU驱动的EC2系列等关键AWS服务，解释客户如何被收费以及最大节省成本的机会在哪里。借鉴真实客户案例，您将学习如何应用FinOps原则来提高GPU利用率、预测支出、实施退款模型和跟踪单位成本指标——确保AWS生成式AI工作负载保持可扩展性和财务可持续性。本演示由AWS合作伙伴IBM Cloudability为您呈现。
